summary: This is an email from the FBI Innocence Lost unit forwarding a public tip report (CT54391248) regarding a possible co-conspirator of Jeffrey Epstein. The email indicates the attached report was submitted by a member of the public.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the investigation; the public tip pertains to a possible co-conspirator of his.

events.title: FBI Receives Public Tip on Epstein Co-conspirator
events.description: The FBI Innocence Lost unit receives and forwards a report (CT54391248) submitted by a member of the public regarding a possible co-conspirator of Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The FBI Innocence Lost unit received a public tip (report CT54391248) regarding a possible co-conspirator of Jeffrey Epstein.
The tip was submitted by a member of the public, indicating ongoing public interest and information flow to law enforcement.
The email was sent on September 3, 2019, after Epstein's arrest in July 2019 and before his death in August 2019.
The document shows the FBI was actively receiving and processing tips related to Epstein's network.
The specific identity of the alleged co-conspirator is not revealed in this email header.
